page.title: 10Market
page.content: Indoor market. The Honourable William Stanley had the Market hall built in 1855.The general idea was to remove all stall holders from the main street as to allow traffic to move without difficulty. Today the market is as busy as ever,it is open every day except Tuesdays.There are various stalls selling all manner of goods ,from sweets tofurniture and carpets. Most of the stalls are run by local people,although some travel in from outside the immediate locality to sell their wears. Some stall holders are also shop owners who supplement their income by having an extra outlet in the market.
